articles.description: Earlier, only those network providers which were registered in the Hospital Registry ROHINI maintained by Insurance Information Bureau (IIB) could be empanelled by the insurers.

articles.title: IndusInd Bank Q1 net profit jumps 60.5% YoY to Rs 1,631.1 crore, beats estimate - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Analysts had expected the lender to report a 46 percent on-year growth in net profit.
articles.content:
IndusInd Bank on July 20 reported a 60.5 percent year-on-year rise in net profit at Rs 1,631.1 crore for the quarter ended June, which was above analysts' expectations of Rs 1,423.5 crore.

articles.title: Bankruptcy court admits Bank of India’s insolvency plea against Future Retail - Economic Times
articles.description: The bankruptcy court on Wednesday admitted the Bank of Indias petition to admit Future Retail Ltd under the Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP) and has also appointed Vijay Kumar Iyer as the interim resolution professional (IRP) of the company.
